name: Cryptax AI
description: The world of cryptocurrency has transformed the global financial landscape, creating a decentralized ecosystem that gives individuals more control over their assets, investments, and transactions. Within this ecosystem, decentralized finance (DeFi) has emerged as a dynamic force, empowering millions of users to trade, lend, borrow, and stake assets without traditional intermediaries. However, with this newfound freedom comes complexityâ€”especially when it comes to tax compliance. Cryptocurrencies and DeFi transactions have introduced unique, intricate challenges to tax reporting, leaving many users struggling to understand and fulfill their tax obligations.
